message: Fellow jurors, I’ve tried to remain an honest, strategic, and respectful participant. I built alliances based on trust, contributed to our collective success, and never wavered in my loyalty. If you value consistency and thoughtful gameplay, I’m your champion. By choosing me, you reward integrity and collaboration. Thank you.

Dear jury, I’ve always played with integrity and teamwork, making calculated decisions that benefited our collective game. I remained consistent under pressure, prioritizing fairness and long-term trust over flashy, risky moves. P3’s choices, though bold, have sometimes sacrificed collaboration and reliability. I respectfully urge you to eliminate P3, keeping a partner who values cohesion and a steady, principled approach to outlasting challenges until the very end. Thank you for your consideration.
